parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group. You can obtain the resource group ID in the **Resource Management** console.

parameters.name: RetcodeAppType
parameters.description:
The type of the application. Valid values:

*   `web`: web application
*   `weex`: Weex mobile app
*   `mini_dd`: DingTalk mini program
*   `mini_alipay`: Alipay mini program
*   `mini_wx`: WeChat mini program
*   `mini_common`: mini program on other platforms

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags that you want to add to the task.
